body.p: The following plugin.xml will enable the post-processing of all files marked as format=NEW_FORMAT.

fig.title: ANT build file
fig.codeblock:
<project name="com.example.passthrough.dita">
<macrodef name="do-something"> <attribute name="src" /> <attribute name="dest" /> <attribute name="title" /> <attribute name="metadata" /> <sequential> <!-- Further processing --> </sequential> </macrodef>
<target name="run-processing"> <passthrough-iterate format="NEW_FORMAT" macro="do-something"/> </target> </project>

body.p: A working example can be found in the DITA-OT Pandoc plug-in repository.
